post:
Hi LowEndTalkers!

I'm pleased to provide you a promotional code to get our MicroSSD VPS with a 5€ discount.
I think is the first published LEB hosted in Spain.


**Full Specs:**

**Tech:** OpenVZ
**CPU:** Xeon E3-12xx - 1 vCore @ 1 GHz
**RAM:** 128 MB DDR3
**vSwap:** 128 MB SSD
**Disk:** 2 GB SSD
**Switchport:** 10 Mbps
**Transfer:** 100 GB/month
**Backups:** 2 SolusVM snapshots included
**Price:** 35€/year
**Promotional code:** LEB

**Test ping and trace:** http://ginernet.com/ping-trace.php

**Test 100 MB download:** http://ginernet.com/100MB.test

**Order VPS:** http://ginernet.com/vps-ssd-openvz.php


We are open to hear suggestions.
Best regards!

****
